title: Please Help My Client Won't Work!
body:
I have tried so many times getting my client to work. Yes I've tried running admin, yes I've deleted the launch folder... 

The problem is this. I reinstalled league because it kept doing the thing where I would click "Okay" because it needs an update or whatever. It wasn't working so I'd click "restart" and it would close and I'd do this over and over. So i reinstalled league. Now I have a similar problem... League will open up and say "The Client Update Has Begun" when it already updated. So I click "Launch" and the client just closes and that's it. So I tried this over and over and it's not working. What do I do? I would like to play League again.

replies.body: When the client is updating, you may need to setup your permissions again to ensure that the updated client can access and update the game files. Run through this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and you should be able to get that update going. If that doesn't help, hit me back up and I've got another little trick up my sleeve.
I've tried all of the options from the permissions guide and it still isn't working.

That at least helps to rule out what the problem *wasn't*! Let's try a bit of a different approach. Refer to the image below, and following the arrows to delete 1 specific file and run a different one. Let me know if this works better ^_^!

https://i.gyazo.com/d6976e1b060022dede938ce98d031890.png
This one worked! Thank you so much! Everyone who has this same issue, do this^^^^ in the picture.
